addr: 12000 San Vicente Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90049
title: Trojans Giving Back: The Giving Spirit
desc: The Giving Spirit is an all-volunteer, Los Angeles-based non-profit organization that unites volunteers to reach out to local individuals and families who are homeless. Twice a year volunteers gather to assemble survival kits filled with daily necessities. The kits are specifically designed to help people experiencing homelessness survive their harsh realities. Please join us to be a part of The Giving Spirit's?Winter 2015 event!  On? Saturday, December 12 , we will be assembling survival kits filled with nutrition, hygiene, and winter weather protection.  For an idea of what we'll be doing, check out  this clip  from the news about the Summer Outreach Event. Adults, children, and families welcome. Free parking is available, and lunch will be provided. On a side note, if you or your company would like to donate items for distribution, please contact? info@thegivingspirit.org .
